overview: Dan is a photographer / filmmaker that is losing his vision due to a degenerative eye disorder. Monika just got out of a long relationship and has recently decided to get back into acting, after having been away from the craft for a number of years. Monika and Dan come together at a rented studio for a brief photo shoot. Dan takes her headshot, and Monika gives him a loaf of fresh bread. The night culminates in a brief moment of intimate warmth between them, before they go their separate ways.
title: I Used To Live There
